reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans very well! Fresh scent. Cleans better than the highest priced ones I used to buy. Actually cleans very well. I recommend on the basis that if it took out the dog odor from my comforter then it’s worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this Stuff!!
reviews.reviewText: Sad that most (All) Store-Fronts have seemed to stop carrying this brand, I have been using this brand for decades as it is just Perfect...Not too strong on scent and gets the clothes clean...Does its Job...Well!! Good to see it available here for a reasonable price and quick shipping without having to get it from some overseas vendor...I love this stuff!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Laundry detergent! Gentle, Clean scent and gets clothes clean!!!
reviews.reviewText: When I've switched to other detergents in the past, my family and friends are real vocal and ask why I switched, and that they love and miss my regular detergent, ERA!!! I usually wash my sheets in ERA with a little bleach, and they smell heavenly. Several guests have commented on how great my sheets smell. My family also comments on how great their towels and clothes smell when I wash them in ERA by itself. It has a wonderful, light clean scent that is very mild. I've tried Tied, but the smell is overwhelmingly too strong. No one likes it. So, I have to order it online as none of the stores carry it here on the East Coast of Florida.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, very reliable, and gentle enough for my sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: This is the first detergent I've ever found that my husband and I will both use happily. While he prefers a heavy duty formula that reliably powers through odors and stains, my extremely sensitive skin reacts very poorly to most soaps, especially those that aren't explicitly mild and fragrance-free. I'm so glad he finally talked me into trying this though! It's the best of both worlds.Even though we pay a little extra to buy it online, the price is still quite reasonable and well worth it. We no longer have to diligently separate our laundry, and we never have to wonder if things got thoroughly washed in the gentle specialty detergents I previously thought were my only options. I've never noticed any irritation whatsoever, and I got to experience the joy of towels and linens that truly smell fresh and clean for the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this detergent
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this detergent for many years. It was one that. didn’t bother my daughters sensitive skin. It is excellent at getting stains out and I am the go to stain remover for the family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This laundry soap is the best it makes your clothes so clean
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for this soap for year. I use to use it all the it cleans your clothes like no other leaving them smelling so fresh. The price says it all it is very affordable and pulls stains from your clothes at half the price of the other brands. I have it on auto replenish to come every month.

reviews.reviewText: Would recommend buying this product it cleans clothes great and gives clothes a good scent

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans my clothes beautifully
reviews.reviewText: Washes my clothes clean and does a great job. No soapy residue. Been using for years and no allergic reactions from anyone in the house.
